_comments.title: Main headline for the hero section. Use {businessName} as a placeholder for the business name.
_comments.subtitle: Secondary text appearing below the title.
_comments.additionalText: An array of strings for extra lines of text. Each string is a new paragraph.
_comments.buttons: An array of button objects. 'text' is the button label. 'action' can be 'scrollTo' (to scroll to an element ID) or 'redirect' (to navigate to a new page). 'target' is the ID or URL path.
_comments.animation: Settings for the entrance animations. 'duration' is the base speed in seconds. 'delayIncrement' is the additional delay for each subsequent animated element.
_comments.backgroundImageUrl: URL for the hero section background image. Leave empty for no image.
_comments.backgroundOverlayColor: The CSS color (e.g., 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)', '#000000', 'hsl(0, 0%, 0%)') for the overlay. This helps with text readability.
_comments.backgroundOverlayOpacity: A value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (solid) for the overlay on the background image. This is applied on top of the color's own alpha channel.
